T10D4201:161b-0: @161b ` // dgra bcom dge 'dun 'phel gyis lung bstan pa bzhugs so//
T10D4201:161b-2: # // dgra bcom pa dge 'dun 'phel gyis lung bstan pa ;
T10D4201:161b-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T10D4201:161b-4: 'di skad bdag gis slob dpon gyis bshad pa thos pa na //
T10D4201:161b-5: yul 'di'i gtsug lag khang bru nya zhes bya ba'i
T10D4201:161b-6: dgra bcom pa dge 'dun 'phel zhes bya ba gsum
T10D4201:161b-7: rig pa mngon par shes pa thob pa /
T10D4201:161b-8: rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa zhig
T10D4201:161b-9: dus gzhan zhig na slob ma zhig dang thabs cig
T10D4201:161b-10: tu dbyar zla ba gsum 'jig tshogs kyi ri zhes
T10D4201:161b-12: slob ma bande chos 'dul ba la slob pa zhig lags na /
T10D4201:161b-13: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas lo nyis stong lon pa dang /
T10D4201:161b-14: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rgya gar gyi yul koo
T10D4201:161b-15: sh'amb'i zhes bya bar nub par 'gyur ro zhes thos
T10D4201:161b-16: nas 'di snyam du rgya gar yul gyi chos dus
T10D4201:161b-18: yul koo sh'amb'ir nub par 'gyur ba lta zhig na /
T10D4201:161b-19: li yul la sogs pa gzhan gyi chos yun ji srid cig tu gnas par 'gyur /
T10D4201:162a-0: nam 'jig rkyen ni gang gis 'jig par @162a * //
T10D4201:162a-1: 'gyur snyam du the tshom skyes so //
T10D4201:162a-2: de nas dgra bcom pa de phyi 'phred kyi dus
T10D4201:162a-3: kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog pa las bzhengs
T10D4201:162a-4: pa dang / slob ma des mkhan po'i zhabs la
T10D4201:162a-5: yan lag ldas phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces the
T10D4201:162a-6: pa dang / tshom zhus so // slob dpon ston
T10D4201:162a-7: pa bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i bstan pa lo
T10D4201:162a-8: nyis stong nas 'jig par lung bstan na /
T10D4201:162a-9: li yul 'di la sogs pa yul gzhan gyi bstan pa ji srid du gnas par 'gyur //
T10D4201:162a-10: nam 'jig rkyen gang gis 'jig par 'gyur ba lags /
T10D4201:162a-11: de nas mkhan pos bka' stsal pa /
T10D4201:162a-12: bu khyod kyis li yul la sogs pa'i skye bo mang po'i don dang /
T10D4201:162a-13: bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas
T10D4201:162a-14: par bya ba'i phyir the tshom dris pa legs kyis
T10D4201:162a-15: / legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang /
T10D4201:162a-16: li yul la sogs pa'i bstan pa ji srid du gnas par 'gyur /
T10D4201:162a-17: nam 'jig pa dang rkyen gang gis 'jig par 'gyur ba ngas so sor lung bstan par bya'o //
T10D4201:162a-18: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i bstan pa ni bcom
T10D4201:162a-19: ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas lo stong lnga
T10D4201:162a-20: brgya lon pa dang yul du dad pa med pa
T10D4201:162a-21: rnams 'byung zhing dam pa'i chos 'jig tu rgol lo
T10D4201:162a-22: // de'i tshe li yul 'dir dad pa med pa'i rgyal po yang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
T10D4201:162a-23: yul yang rgyal pos phan tshun rtod cing 'phrog par 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:162a-24: de phyin chad ni yul yang nyin gcig bzhin du nyams par 'gyur /
T10D4201:162a-25: grong dang gtsug lag khang la sogs pa yang phal cher stongs par 'gyur /
T10D4201:162a-26: mi rnams kyang nyin gcig bzhin du phyir yang dkon mchog gsum la dad pa 'bri bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:162a-27: rgyu des na dkon mchog gsum dang /
T10D4201:162a-29: bsam gtan pa kun kyang mchod gnas su mi byed cing /
T10D4201:162a-30: mu stegs kyi rgyal po dang /
T10D4201:162a-33: khyim bdag rnams kyang chos dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs
T10D4201:162a-34: 'dzin cing dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yal bar
T10D4201:162a-36: / chos dang mthun pa ma yin pa dang /
T10D4201:162a-38: bab chol gyi longs spyod kyang sogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:162a-39: de nas de'i 'og tu dge slong dang /
T10D4201:162a-40: dge slong ma rnams 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyi phyir g-yem spyo bar gyur te /
T10D4201:162a-41: chos 'dul ba las 'byung ba dge sbyong gi tshul dang /
T10D4201:162b-3: khrel yod pa la sogs pa yal bar 'gyur zhing /
T10D4201:162b-8: slong mo ba rnams kyis 'tsho bar byed do //
T10D4201:162b-9: khyim pas bslab par bya ba'i bzo dang /
T10D4201:162b-12: sgo gsol zam[?] po che yang byed par 'gyur /
T10D4201:162b-15: rtsa 'jid yang tshol bar byed par 'gyur te /
T10D4201:162b-16: de'i tshe gtsug lag khang dang /
T10D4201:162b-17: dgon pa la mi gnas shing bde bar gshegs pa'i gdams ngag yal bar bor te /
T10D4201:162b-18: yang dang yang du mkhar dang /
T10D4201:162b-22: sum mdo na gnas par sems dga' bar 'gyur /
T10D4201:162b-25: rkang 'gros kyang tshol bar byed do //
T10D4201:162b-26: rgyu des na khyim bdag dang /
T10D4201:162b-28: blon po la sogs pas kyang de dag la rim gro mi byed cing /
T10D4201:162b-29: dad pa phyir log nas dkon mchog dang dge 'dun gyi dkor la yang 'phrog par byed do //
T10D4201:162b-30: khyim pa de dag gis kyang nor rdzas de dag
T10D4201:162b-31: la brten cing spyad pas bsod nams 'bri bar 'gyur
T10D4201:162b-32: ro // rgyu des na li yul la sogs par
T10D4201:162b-33: gnod pa sna tshogs 'byung zhing lo re bzhin dma'
T10D4201:162b-34: ro // bar 'gyur te / rtsod pa dang /
T10D4201:162b-36: dus ma yin pa'i char dang /
T10D4201:162b-38: dgra mang po yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:162b-39: dus ma yin pa'i sad dang /
T10D4201:162b-43: de'i tshe na sems can rnams nang mi mthun par 'gyur zhing dus tshigs kyang 'chol bar 'gyur te /
T10D4201:162b-44: de ltar na yul gang dang gang du chos lugs
T10D4201:162b-45: log pa byed pa de dang der ni gnod pa
T10D4201:162b-47: de'i tshe li yul la sogs par rgyal po dang /
T10D4201:162b-48: blon po la sogs pa ya rabs las kyang dkon
T10D4201:162b-49: mchog la snying thag pa nas dad pa 'ga' las
T10D4201:162b-50: mi 'byung na / phal pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T10D4201:162b-51: rgyu de lta bus li yul la sogs pa'i dkon
T10D4201:162b-52: mchog gsum gyi mchod gnas thams cad kyi thams cad
T10D4201:162b-54: de nas li yul la sogs par dge slong gi
T10D4201:162b-55: gnas sngon rgyal po la sogs pa dad pa can
T10D4201:162b-56: gyis byas pa yang blon po la sogs pa dad
T10D4201:163a-0: pa med pa rnams kyis btsan @163a * //
T10D4201:163a-1: 'phrogs su 'phrogs nas bdag nyid gnas par byed do //
T10D4201:163a-2: dge slong rnams kyang 'khyams nas 'tsho ba dang /
T10D4201:163a-5: blon po la sogs pa de dag gis dge slong gi zhing chu dang /
T10D4201:163a-6: ldum ra la sogs pa yo byad rnams kyang btsan thab su 'phrog par byed /
T10D4201:163a-8: nang gi g-yog rnams kyang dge slong gi ngag mi nyan cing gnya' rengs su byed par 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:163a-9: de nas dge slong rnams kyis kyang de lta bur gyur par shes nas yi mug ste /
T10D4201:163a-10: li yul gyi dge slong rnams phan tshun du gcig
T10D4201:163a-11: la gcig 'di skad du yu bu cag rnams gtsug
T10D4201:163a-12: lag khang tshar ma zhes bya ba dang po chos
T10D4201:163a-13: 'byung ba'i gnas der 'du'o zhes sbran nas gtsug lag
T10D4201:163a-15: dpyid zla tha chungs tshes bco lnga'i nub mo gso
T10D4201:163a-16: sbyong byas nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du yu
T10D4201:163a-17: bu cag rnams sngon bag med par gyur nas mkhas
T10D4201:163a-18: pa chos dang mthun pa rnams la dbang zos pa'i
T10D4201:163a-19: rgyus de ltar khyim pa rnams kyis kyang rtsis med
T10D4201:163a-20: par byas te / da ni 'tsho ba yang mi 'byor na deng phyin chad gang du 'dong /
T10D4201:163a-21: thabs ni gang gis 'tsho bar bya zhes smras te /
T10D4201:163a-22: de'i tshe thams cad kyis cho de chen po 'debs par 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:163a-23: de nas de'i tshe bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa srung ba'i lha /
T10D4201:163a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyi byas pa gzo ba thams cad
T10D4201:163a-25: kyang gtsug lag khang der 'dus te gcig la gcig
T10D4201:163a-26: lta zhing 'di skad du bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan
T10D4201:163a-27: pa ni yun ring por mi gnas so //
T10D4201:163a-28: yul 'di yang stongs par 'gyur ro zhes mya ngan byed cing du bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:163a-29: de'i tshe dge slong de dag 'di snyam du yul
T10D4201:163a-30: 'dir ni 'tsho ba mi 'byor na 'di bor te
T10D4201:163a-31: yul gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o snyam du sems mthun
T10D4201:163a-32: par gyur pa gang du 'dod par bya zhes gros
T10D4201:163a-33: byas te / yul nye ba gzhan dang gzhan na ni dad pa med pa dag gis gang /
T10D4201:163a-34: rgya gar yul du 'dod du ni lam mi thar bas bod kyi yul na /
T10D4201:163a-35: dkon mchog gsum la mchod gnas su byed ces grags
T10D4201:163a-36: pas der 'gro bar byas nas nyi ma 'di la
T10D4201:163a-37: 'dong ngo zhes dus btab nas de'i nub mo gtsug
T10D4201:163a-38: lag khang tshar mar gzhag go //
T10D4201:163b-0: nam langs pa dang bud med dad pa can @163b zhig gis gdan chud la spyan drangs te /
T10D4201:163b-1: de nas gand'i brdungs nas dge 'dun spyi'i gtsug lag khang bskor te mchod pa byas pa dang /
T10D4201:163b-2: sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi gdan khri zhig gas
T10D4201:163b-3: pa'i gseb nas sgrom bu tha ram can zhig snang
T10D4201:163b-4: bar gyur te / de nas sgrom bu de phye ba dang /
T10D4201:163b-5: de'i nang nas gser las byas pa'i kha zas kyi sder cha bdun byung ste /
T10D4201:163b-6: dge slong kun gyis de blangs te /
T10D4201:163b-7: 'brur bsgyur nas de dge 'dun kun dbyar zla ba
T10D4201:163b-8: gsum gtsug lag khang tshar mar tshul du 'jug pa'i
T10D4201:163b-9: 'tsho ba sbyar nas zong lhag ma las yul nas
T10D4201:163b-10: byung ste / 'gro ba'i lam brgyags dang khur khal sbyar re//
T10D4201:163b-11: dbyar zla ba gsum 'das nas 'di skad du yu
T10D4201:163b-12: bu rnams byin gyis brlabs pa'i yul 'di bltas la
T10D4201:163b-13: 'gro bar bya'o zhes smras te song nas /
T10D4201:163b-14: 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i gnas gtsug lag khang ye
T10D4201:163b-15: shes ri zhes bya ba'i drung du phyin pa dang
T10D4201:163b-16: / de'i tshe de na brag la mchod rten gyi
T10D4201:163b-17: 'og gzhi rnyed pa zhig yod pa rdib pa'i nang
T10D4201:163b-18: / nas / gser phor chen po mu tig gis
T10D4201:163b-19: gang ba zhig byung ba dang de yang blangs te
T10D4201:163b-20: 'brur bsgyur nas phyogs der rgun zla ba gsum gnas
T10D4201:163b-22: de nas dpyid byung ste 'gro ba'i dus la bab nas song ste /
T10D4201:163b-23: shel chu 'og ma brgal ba dang /
T10D4201:163b-24: yul mi stod pa rnams kyis sa lam yogs su gdugs tshod sbyar nas /
T10D4201:163b-25: nyi ma re re zhing gtsug lag khang dag tu gdugs tshod gsol bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:163b-26: de'i tshe yul mi smad pa rnams kyis kyang dge
T10D4201:163b-27: slong rnams yul byung ste 'gro zhes thos nas dge
T10D4201:163b-28: 'dun de dag gtsug lag khang cong zhes bya bar
T10D4201:163b-29: spyan drangs nas / zhag bdun gyi bar du bshos sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:163b-30: de'i tshe li yul na gnas pa'i klu thams cad
T10D4201:163b-31: 'di snyam du bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni
T10D4201:163b-32: rmegs med par 'gyur la thug go snyam du mya
T10D4201:163b-33: ngan byed cing bstan pa gnas par bya ba'i phyir
T10D4201:163b-35: char pa des gtsug lag khang cong zhes bya ba'i
T10D4201:163b-36: nang nas mchod rten gyi gzhi zhig yod pa nas
T10D4201:163b-37: gser phor gser phyes gang ba zhig byung ba dang
T10D4201:163b-38: / de yang dge 'dun gyis btsongs nas dpyid kyi 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:164a-0: de nas yang yul mi smad pa rnams kyis gtsug lag khang @164a * //
T10D4201:164a-1: s'a la'i tshal zhes bya bar dge 'dun rnams spyan
T10D4201:164a-2: drangs nas zhag bdun gyi bar gyi gdugs tshod gsol
T10D4201:164a-3: nas zhag bdun lon pa'i nyin par yul stod smad
T10D4201:164a-4: kyi mi thams cad gtsug lag khang sa na bar
T10D4201:164a-5: 'dus nas dge 'dun la rdzongs dang khur khal 'bul
T10D4201:164a-6: lo // de'i tshe mi rgan rgon rnams na bslab pa 'dzin par byed /
T10D4201:164a-7: gzhon nu rnams ni rgyar nas lta zhing gad mos 'debs pa dang grogs byed par 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:164a-8: de'i tshe mkhar dge ba can gyi nang nas kyang
T10D4201:164a-9: mi rgan rgon kha cig gis gos kha dog bsgyur
T10D4201:164a-10: ba dang / lam du 'jug pa'i yo byad so
T10D4201:164a-11: so nas thogs nas so so'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
T10D4201:164a-12: dge slong de dag gi mdun du lhags nas 'phags
T10D4201:164a-13: pa rnams bzod par bzhes shig ces smra zhing mchis
T10D4201:164a-14: ba dang / te / phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:164a-15: de'i tshe mchod pa de ni dper na ku sha'i
T10D4201:164a-16: grong khyer gyi mi rnams bcom ldan 'das mya ngan
T10D4201:164a-17: las 'das par shes nas mya ngan byed pa bzhin
T10D4201:164a-18: du mchod pa byed pa dang 'dra bar /
T10D4201:164a-19: li yul du dkon mchog gsum mchod pa'i tha ma yin no //
T10D4201:164a-20: de'i 'og tu dge slong rnams gtsug lag khang de
T10D4201:164a-21: nas bod yul ngos su chas pa dang lam khan
T10D4201:164a-22: mchod rten rnying pa zhig gi drung du dpal lha
T10D4201:164a-23: mo chen mos dge 'dun gyi ched du gser gyi
T10D4201:164a-24: dang tse phu dung gang bzhag pa rnyed nas dge
T10D4201:164a-25: 'dun gyis de ba gos te lam gyi chas rdzas
T10D4201:164a-27: de'i tshe li yul gyi mkhar gtsug lag khang ka
T10D4201:164a-28: sa ra zhes bya bar rgyal rigs las skyes pa'i
T10D4201:164a-30: yon bdag des dge 'dun rnams zhag bdun du mchod ston gsol bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:164a-31: de'i tshe mchod ston gsol ba de ni li yul
T10D4201:164a-32: du dge 'dun gyi mchod ston gsol ba'i tha ma
T10D4201:164a-33: yin no // de nas dge slong rnams me skar gyi lam du zhugs te song ba dang /
T10D4201:164a-34: de'i tshe dge slong pho mo gsar bu las phal cher rang rang gi slob dpon dang /
T10D4201:164a-35: mkhan po la chos gos phul te bzod par gsol
T10D4201:164a-36: nas slar yul du ldog par 'gyur dge slong pho
T10D4201:164a-37: mo gsar bu kha cig ni rab tu byung ba'i
T10D4201:164a-38: dngos po mi gtong zhing pha ma la sogs pa'i
T10D4201:164a-39: gnyen skyel du 'ongs pa rnams la mya ngan gyi
T10D4201:164a-40: tshig smra zhing dus nas gnyen rnams phyir bzlog ste
T10D4201:164b-0: / dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu @164b mi dga'
T10D4201:164b-1: ba'i yid kyis phyir byin gyis brlabs pa'i yul dang
T10D4201:164b-2: / / gnyen gyi rjes bzhin du lta bzhin par
T10D4201:164b-3: me skar gyi lam du zhugs te 'gro bar 'gyur
T10D4201:164b-4: / / ro // de ltar song ba dang de'i tshe rnam thos kyi bu dang /
T10D4201:164b-5: dpal lha mo chen mo gnyis mchog tu snying rje skyes te /
T10D4201:164b-6: 'brog mi pho mo gnyis kyi lus su bsgyur te /
T10D4201:164b-7: dge 'dun rnams spyan drangs nas yul me skar du
T10D4201:164b-8: zla ba gsum gyi bar du gdugs tshod gsol te
T10D4201:164b-9: / lam du 'jug pa'i yo byad ci dgos pa yang rdzong bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:164b-10: de nas dge slong de dag mdo lo'i lam du
T10D4201:164b-11: zhugs nas ri dang lung pa'i sul gtugs te song
T10D4201:164b-12: ba dang / 'brog dgon par lam stor nas du
T10D4201:164b-13: zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang li yul
T10D4201:164b-14: gyi lha thams cad kyi ming nas 'bod par 'gyur
T10D4201:164b-15: ba dang / ro // de'i tshe rnam thos kyi
T10D4201:164b-16: bu snying rje skyas nas g-yag dkar po sgal pa
T10D4201:164b-17: ba dang / ro // dang / snal chu can
T10D4201:164b-18: cig tu sprul nas dge slong de dag gi drung
T10D4201:164b-19: du 'ongs pa dang dge slong rnams kyis de mthong
T10D4201:164b-20: nas g-yag 'di ni mi'i khal g-yag cig yin te
T10D4201:164b-22: bzhin song na gdon mi za bar mi rnams dang
T10D4201:164b-23: phrad par 'gyur bas da ni mi 'chi'o snyam du
T10D4201:164b-24: ba dang / ro // dang / / yid sos
T10D4201:164b-25: te / g-yag des kyang lam drangs nas gseb lam
T10D4201:164b-26: ba dang / ro // dang / / yid sos
T10D4201:164b-27: te / du byung ste / tshal byir bskyal nas
T10D4201:164b-28: g-yag nyid mi snang bar gyur to ;
T10D4201:164b-29: / de'i tshe dge slong rgan rgon mang po zhig ni lam kar 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:164b-30: de nas yul tshal byi'i bod rnams kyis dge slong de dag mthong nas bsu te //
T10D4201:164b-31: 'phral du yo byad rnams sbyar nas bod yul 'dir
T10D4201:164b-32: li yul gyi dge slong mang po lhags na ji
T10D4201:164b-33: ltar bgyi zhes pho nyar gtong bar 'gyur ro ;
T10D4201:164b-34: / de'i tshe na rgya rje'i bu mo byang chub
T10D4201:164b-35: sems dpa'i rigs can cig btsas pa bod kyi rgyal
T10D4201:164b-36: po'i khab tu len cing btsun mo dam pa byed
T10D4201:164b-37: par 'gyur te // de ni dad pa shin tu che ba /
T10D4201:164b-38: snying rje dang ldan pa skad snyan pa dang des pa /
T10D4201:164b-39: bslab pa'i yan lag lnga bzung ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:164b-40: btsun mo des nyi 'og gzhan nas dge slong mang po bod kyi yul du lhags par mthong nas /
T10D4201:164b-41: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni ring du mi gnas
T10D4201:164b-42: so snyam nas mya ngan chen pos non nas rang
T10D4201:164b-43: gi 'khor bud med nyis brgya dang /
T10D4201:165a-0: gzo bo dang gnang chen rnams drung du @165a * //
T10D4201:165a-1: bos te dus nas 'di skad ces /
T10D4201:165a-2: bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni de 'u re
T10D4201:165a-3: 'jig par gyur gyis khyed rnams myur du bsod nams
T10D4201:165a-4: ma byas / tshul khrims ma bsrungs na 'phyis par 'ong do zhes smras par 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:165a-5: de nas btsun mo des rgyal po la 'di skad
T10D4201:165a-6: du dge 'dun de rnams bdag gis bzhon pa dang
T10D4201:165a-7: gos la sogs pa'i yo byad sbyar nas 'dir spyan
T10D4201:165a-8: drang bar ci gnang zhes gsol pas rgyal pos kyang
T10D4201:165a-10: tshul de lta bus dge slong de dag bod yul du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:165a-11: de'i tshe bod yul gyi rgyal po dang blon po
T10D4201:165a-12: rnams kyis dge slong de dag mthod nas dad pa
T10D4201:165a-13: chen po skye zhing gtsug lag khang chen po bdun
T10D4201:165a-15: de bzhin du dge slong aan rtse pa dang gus tig pa dang /
T10D4201:165a-17: shu lag pa rnams kyang sdug bsngal chen pos non nas bru sha'i yul du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:165a-19: kha che'i yul gyi dge slong rnams kyang dad pa med pa'i mi rnams kyis gtses te /
T10D4201:165a-20: ma chags nas zu sha'i yul du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:165a-21: dge slong de dag thams cad kyis bru sha'i yul du phyin nas /
T10D4201:165a-22: bod yul na gtsug lag khang mang po brtsigs pa dang /
T10D4201:165a-23: rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' zhig gnas pas dkon
T10D4201:165a-24: mchog gsum la mchod pa dang ri mo cher byed
T10D4201:165a-25: pa thos nas yid dga' ste /
T10D4201:165a-26: thams cad bod yul du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:165a-27: bod yul du lhags nas lo gsum gyi bar du
T10D4201:165a-28: ni mchod pa chen po la sogs pa skyid pa
T10D4201:165a-30: lo gsum lon pa dang bod kyi yul du bdud kyi ris kyi lha dang /
T10D4201:165a-34: dri za rnams kyis nad chen po 'bras dang /
T10D4201:165a-36: 'brum bu gdug pa dag gtong bar 'gyur te /
T10D4201:165a-37: nad des zhang blon dang dmag du ma dag 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:165a-38: de'i tshe rgyal mo de'i snying gar 'bras gsug pa byung sta /
T10D4201:165a-39: shi nas lha yul du skye bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:165a-40: de'i tshe bod kyi zhang blon rnams khros 'khrugs te
T10D4201:165a-41: 'di skad ces bdag cag gi yul 'di sngon gya
T10D4201:165a-42: nom pa las phyis mi bkra mi shis pa 'khyams
T10D4201:165a-43: pa sha stag 'dir lhags nas da ni yul du
T10D4201:165b-0: yang 'di lta @165b bu gnod pa rnam ba sna
T10D4201:165b-2: rdzas lhag ma 'di rnams kyang yul 'dir mi gzhag
T10D4201:165b-3: cing sa mtshams 'das te bskrad par bya'o zhes gros
T10D4201:165b-4: byas nas dge slong gcig kyang bod yul du gnas
T10D4201:165b-5: su mi gnang ngo zhes glo bur du bsgo bar
T10D4201:165b-6: 'gyur ro // rgyal mo de nad kyis thebs pa'i
T10D4201:165b-7: tshe bdag nyid mi 'tsho bar tshor nas rgyal po
T10D4201:165b-8: la kha chems su bdag gum na bdag gi nor
T10D4201:165b-9: rdzas ril gyis dge 'dun la 'bul bar ci gnang
T10D4201:165b-10: zhes gsol nas rgyal pos kyang gnang ste /
T10D4201:165b-11: btsun mo'i rdzas thams cad dge 'dun la 'bul zhing
T10D4201:165b-12: des rgya gar gyi yul gan dha ra zhes bya
T10D4201:165b-13: bar 'gro ba'i rdzas byas nas 'gro bar 'gyur ro
T10D4201:165b-14: // de'i tshe bod yul gyi dge slong rnams kyang
T10D4201:165b-15: yi chad nas nyi 'og gi dge slong rnams dang
T10D4201:165b-16: gros gcig tu byas nas lhan cig tu 'gro bar
T10D4201:165b-17: // 'gyur ro // skye bo dang rtsod pa'i dus
T10D4201:165b-18: de'i tshe rgya yul gyi dge slong rnams kyang shin
T10D4201:165b-19: tu sdug bsngal bas gzir nas yul gandha rar 'gro
T10D4201:165b-21: dong ba dang dge slong de dag thams cad yul
T10D4201:165b-22: gan dha rar 'gro ba'i lam kar phrad par 'gyur
T10D4201:165b-24: de'i tshe bod kyi dmag gis rjes bzhin bsnyags nas
T10D4201:165b-26: nor phyugs dag phrogs te dge slong dag kyang gsod par 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:165b-27: de ltar dge slong de dag bod kyi dmag gis
T10D4201:165b-28: bdas nas klu'i rgyal po ae la'i 'dab kyi gnas
T10D4201:165b-30: klu'i rgyal po ae la'i 'dab kyis mi rgan zhig
T10D4201:165b-31: gi gzugs su bsgyur te dge 'dun gyi mdun du
T10D4201:165b-33: skyes bu dam pa khyed rnams gar gshegs zhes dris pa dang /
T10D4201:165b-34: dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad du bdag cag gi
T10D4201:165b-35: yul na dad pa med pa sha stag gis gdabs
T10D4201:165b-36: 'tsho ba'i yo byad la sogs pas phongs te /
T10D4201:165b-37: da yul gan dha rar 'tsho ba'i yo byad tsam
T10D4201:165b-38: zhig ci rnyed snyam nas lhags so zhes smras pa
T10D4201:165b-39: dang / de nas de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po de
T10D4201:165b-40: bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'jig pa'i mtshan ma
T10D4201:165b-41: rtogs nas mchi ma khrag tu 'dzag cing dus nas
T10D4201:165b-42: dang / / dge 'dun rnams la yul der gshegs
T10D4201:165b-43: nas shul brgyags ji tsam mnga' zhes rmed par 'gyur
T10D4201:166a-0: dang / / ro // dge 'dun kun gyis kyang zhib tu brtsis @166a * //
T10D4201:166a-1: nas zhag bco lnga'i brgyags yod do zhes smra bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:166a-2: klu'i rgyal pos 'di skad du 'di nas yul gan
T10D4201:166a-3: dha rar mtsho 'di'i g-yas g-yon du bskor na zhag
T10D4201:166a-4: bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i shul mchis na /
T10D4201:166a-6: gzhan yang shul ka nas la ka mthon po dang nags tshal stug po dang /
T10D4201:166a-9: sdig sbrul la sogs pa dang /
T10D4201:166a-10: chom rkun pa yang mchis pas phyi nas tshur yang dmag gis bsnyegs pa dang /
T10D4201:166a-11: mtsho 'di'i nang na yang bdag gi 'khor gtum po
T10D4201:166a-12: dad pa ma mchis pa du ma zhig mchis pas
T10D4201:166a-13: bdag gis phyir bzlog par mi nus te /
T10D4201:166a-14: bdag ni de'i shul du bzhud par mi dga' zhing mchis so //
T10D4201:166a-15: de'i tshe dge slong pho mo mang po de dag
T10D4201:166a-16: thams cad 'di snyam du bdag cag rnams 'chi ba'i
T10D4201:166a-17: dus la bab pa 'dra snyam nas du zhing mya
T10D4201:166a-19: de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po ae pa'i[?] 'dab kyis dge
T10D4201:166a-20: 'dun rnams kyi mdun du pus mo btsugs nas dge
T10D4201:166a-21: 'dun ma bshums shig / bdag gis dge 'dun rnams
T10D4201:166a-22: kyi slad du srog kyang yongs su btang zhing bdag
T10D4201:166a-23: nyid kyi lus mtsho 'di'i steng du zam par bgyid
T10D4201:166a-24: lags so // bdag gis sngon bde bar gshegs pa'i
T10D4201:166a-25: bstan pa thog mar legs par ma bsrungs par chad
T10D4201:166a-26: par srog gis god pa zhig gcod par 'tshal lo
T10D4201:166a-28: de nas klu'i rgyal po des rang gi lus sbrul chen po zhig gi gzugs su bsgyur nas /
T10D4201:166a-29: bod yul ngos kyi ri 'i rtse mo la ni mgos 'khyud /
T10D4201:166a-30: yul gan dha ra'i ri'i rtse mo la ni mjug
T10D4201:166a-31: mas 'khyud de lus kyi zheng du ni shing rta
T10D4201:166a-32: lnga'i khyon tsam gyi zam par btags so //
T10D4201:166a-33: de'i tshe dge slong de dag gis sbrul chen po de'i gzugs de mthong nas sngangs skrag ste /
T10D4201:166a-35: de nas klu'i rgyal po des mi skad phyung ste /
T10D4201:166a-37: bdag gi lus 'di khyed kyi slad du zam par btags pa lags kyis /
T10D4201:166a-38: ma bsnyengs par rjes dgra choms su dogs pa ni
T10D4201:166a-39: 'bangs dang phyag rjed dang khur rnams sngon la dgyer
T10D4201:166a-40: du gsol de'i 'og tu dge 'dun gzhon rims gshegs
T10D4201:166b-0: su gsol // bgres po rnams ni slad kyis gshegs su @166b gsol zhes smra bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:166b-1: de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po de'i rgyab kyi pags pa
T10D4201:166b-2: phyugs kyi rmig pa dang mi'i rkang pas bshus te
T10D4201:166b-3: rma chen po byung ste mtsho'i nang du rnag khrag
T10D4201:166b-5: mi phyugs phal yang mtsho'i nang du ltung zhing 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:166b-6: tha mar dge 'dun rgan rabs rgal ba'i 'og tu klu'i rgyal po nyid kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:166b-7: mtsho de yang skams par 'gyur te /
T10D4201:166b-8: mtsho bskams pa'i nang du klu'i rgyal po shi ba'i rus pa ri lta bur 'dug par 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:166b-9: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas byams pa 'khor
T10D4201:166b-10: lnga brgya dang thabs cog tu klu'i rgyal po ae
T10D4201:166b-11: la'i 'dab kyi rus pa'i drung du gshegs te klu'i
T10D4201:166b-12: rgyal po ae la'i 'dab kyi skyes pa'i rabs brjod
T10D4201:166b-13: pas byams pa'i 'khor dge slong lnga brgya po de
T10D4201:166b-14: dag thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob
T10D4201:166b-15: par 'gyur ro // de nas dge slong de dag
T10D4201:166b-16: yul gan dha rar phyin nas lo gnyis kyi par
T10D4201:166b-17: par 'gyur ro // du gnas so // lo gsum
T10D4201:166b-18: pa'i tshe yul de'i rgyal po dad pa can zhig
T10D4201:166b-20: rgyal po de shi ba'i 'og tu rgyal po de'i
T10D4201:166b-21: bu dad pa can zhig dang dad pa med pa
T10D4201:166b-22: zhig rgyal srid la brtod nas dmag gi g-yul bkye
T10D4201:166b-23: nas / phyogs gnyis su chad par 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:166b-24: de'i tshe na dge slong de dag gi nang na
T10D4201:166b-25: dge slong dpa' ba brtul phod pa tsham tshom med
T10D4201:166b-26: par stong zhig yod pas rgyal bu dad pa med
T10D4201:166b-27: pa de dmag gis btab ste pham par byas nas
T10D4201:166b-28: rgyal bu dad pa can de la rgyal srid 'bul
T10D4201:166b-29: bar 'gyur ro // rgyal bu dad pa can des
T10D4201:166b-30: zla ba lnga rgyal po byas nas yang dge slong
T10D4201:166b-31: stong po de dag gis bsad nas dge slong gcig
T10D4201:166b-32: rgyal po la bcug ste lo gnyis kyi bar du
T10D4201:166b-34: de'i tshe yul gan dha ra'i blon po dang yul
T10D4201:166b-35: mi thams cad 'dus te gsangs nas ci'i phyir nyi
T10D4201:166b-36: 'og gi mi bdag cag gi yul du bros pa
T10D4201:166b-37: / ngan pa 'dis bdag cag gi rgyal po gsad
T10D4201:166b-38: do zhes gros byas nas 'phral la dmag drangs te
T10D4201:166b-40: de'i tshe yul gan dha ra na gnas pa'i dge
T10D4201:166b-41: slong thams cad mthong dgu bsad de dge slong gang
T10D4201:166b-42: zhig yul dbus su bros te thar pa de 'ba'
T10D4201:167a-1: gtogs par 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na dad pa med pa gsum 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T10D4201:167a-2: sig ni la sogs pa mang po zhig gis rgyal
T10D4201:167a-3: po na ti zig gi rgyal po byed par 'gyur
T10D4201:167a-4: ro // dru gu rus sna tshogs du mi'i rgyal po ni dru gus byed par 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:167a-5: gzhan mang po zhig gi rgyal po ni bod kyi rgyal po byed par 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:167a-6: rgyal po de gsum ka ni yang sems mthun par 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:167a-7: rgyal po de gsum la dmag dpa' ba /
T10D4201:167a-8: brtul bod pa sum 'bum zhig yod pas yul dbus ma gtogs pa /
T10D4201:167a-9: gzhan yang dag pa'i lta ba'i dzin pa'i yul thams
T10D4201:167a-10: cad bcom nas mi mang po kha btags nas grong
T10D4201:167a-11: la sogs pa yang stongs par 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:167a-12: de nas rgyal po de gsum 'dus nas yul dbus su dmag drangs zhes gros byed par 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:167a-13: de'i tshe na yul dbus koo sh'amb'i zhes bya bar
T10D4201:167a-14: rgyal po bzod dka' zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar
T10D4201:167a-15: 'gyur te / de btsas pa'i tshe khrag gi char
T10D4201:167a-16: pa yang 'bab lag pa gnyis kyang gru mo man
T10D4201:167a-17: chad khrag gis bskus pa lta bur dmar ba zhig
T10D4201:167a-18: yin no de'i blon po yan lag mchog dang ldan
T10D4201:167a-19: pa lnga brgya dang dmag mi g-yul ngor dpa' ba
T10D4201:167a-21: de'i tshe ta zig gi rgyal po la sogs pa
T10D4201:167a-22: gsum yul dbus koo sh'amb'ir sod nas rgyal po bzod
T10D4201:167a-24: de nas rgyal po bzod dkas de skad thos nas
T10D4201:167a-25: dmag dang chas te rgyal po de dag gi mdun
T10D4201:167a-26: du bsgugs nas zla ba gsum gyi bar du rgyun
T10D4201:167a-27: du g-yul chen po sprad pa dang /
T10D4201:167a-28: rgyal po dad pa med pa de gsum dmag dang bcas te gtan med par brlag par 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:167a-29: rgyal po bzod dka' dmag dang bcas pa slar yul
T10D4201:167a-30: du 'khor nas rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag
T10D4201:167a-31: gis mi mang po kha btags na /
T10D4201:167a-32: bdag gi 'gro ba ni ji lta bu zhig tu skye bar 'gyur /
T10D4201:167a-33: nam zhig ngan song gsum las thar par 'gyur snyam du 'gyod pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:167a-34: de nas rgyal po de la blon po rnams kyis gsol ba /
T10D4201:167a-35: ma bsnyengs par dmar bu can gyi yul na dge
T10D4201:167a-36: slong shir sha ka zhes bgyi ba sde snod gsum
T10D4201:167a-37: la mkhas pa zhig bzhugs pas de spyan drongs dang
T10D4201:167a-38: / des lha khyod kyi las ngan pa de bshags par 'gyur ro zhes smra bar 'gyur la /
T10D4201:167b-0: rgyal pos @167b byang dge slong de spyan drangs nas /
T10D4201:167b-1: de'i mdun du las ngan pa ji ltar byas pa thams cad lo rgyus smra bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:167b-2: dge slong des kyang 'di skad du rgyal po khyod
T10D4201:167b-3: kyis shin tu ma legs pa byas kyi che thang
T10D4201:167b-4: du 'gyod la / 'dzam bu'i gling gi dge slong
T10D4201:167b-5: thams cad 'dir spyan drongs la rtag tu yo byad
T10D4201:167b-6: du 'gyod la / lnga phul te ; skyabs su
T10D4201:167b-7: 'gro ba dang nyin gcig bzhin du dge 'dun gyi
T10D4201:167b-8: mdun du sdig pa shogs shig / khyod kyis mi
T10D4201:167b-9: mang po kha btags pa'i las bsrabs par 'gyur ro
T10D4201:167b-11: de nas de'i tshe rgyal po des yul yul gyi
T10D4201:167b-12: dge slong rnams spyan 'dren pa gtong bar 'gyur ro
T10D4201:167b-13: // dge slong rnams kyis kyang yul koo sh'amb'i zhes
T10D4201:167b-14: bya ba na rgyal po bzod dka' zhes bya ba
T10D4201:167b-15: dge 'dun la yo byad lnga 'bul ba zhig yod
T10D4201:167b-16: do zhes thos nas yi rangs te /
T10D4201:167b-17: yul koo sh'amb'i zhes bya bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:167b-18: de'i tshe yul koo sh'amb'ir dge slong 'bum 'du bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:167b-19: de nas tshes bco lnga'i nub mo dge slong rnams
T10D4201:167b-20: gso sbyong la 'dus te dge slong shing sha ka
T10D4201:167b-21: bos nas khyed kyis so sor thar pa'i mdo thon
T10D4201:167b-23: dge slong shir sha kas kyang 'di skad du khyed rnams la so sor thar pas ci zhig bya /
T10D4201:167b-24: mi sna dang rna ba gcad pa la me long gis ci zhig bya zhes smra bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:167b-25: de nas de'i tshe dge slong de dag gi nang
T10D4201:167b-26: na dgra bcom ba su ta ra zhes bya ba
T10D4201:167b-27: langs nas seng ge lta bu'i skad kyis dge slong
T10D4201:167b-28: shir sha ka la 'di skad ces khyod ci'i phyir
T10D4201:167b-29: de skad ces smra kho bo ni bde bar gshegs
T10D4201:167b-30: pas bka' stsal pa bzhin bslab pa cig kyang ma
T10D4201:167b-31: nyams so zhes smras pa dang /
T10D4201:167b-32: dge slong shir sha ka shin tu skyengs par 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:167b-33: de nas dge slong shing shaka'i slob ma aa kan
T10D4201:167b-34: bi zhes bya bas dgra bcom pa de la 'di
T10D4201:167b-35: skad du khyod ci'i phyir nga'i slob dpon la mi
T10D4201:167b-36: mad sngar de skad smra zhes khros nas lag pa
T10D4201:167b-37: gnyis kyis sgo gtan blangs nas dgra bcom pa de
T10D4201:167b-39: de nas dgra bcom pa de'i slob ma dge slong
T10D4201:167b-40: ka ra ta zhes bya bas kyang rang gi slob
T10D4201:167b-41: dpon gsad par mthong nas shin tu khros te dbyug
T10D4201:167b-42: pa blangs nas dge slong shir sha ka gsod par
T10D4201:167b-43: 'gyur ro // de'i tshe dge slong dag rim gyis
T10D4201:167b-44: khros nas phyog gnyis su chad nas gcig gis gcig
T10D4201:168a-1: de nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha thams cad der lhags te /
T10D4201:168a-2: dge slong shi ba'i ro de dag mthong nas dud mos 'debs shing mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:168a-3: dge slong de dag gis gos kha dog bsgyur ba
T10D4201:168a-4: dang skra dang sen mo yang lha'i gnas su khyer
T10D4201:168a-5: bar 'gyur ro ; / de'i tshe yul der rlung dmar nag po dang /
T10D4201:168a-6: ser po dang 'dres pa ldang zhing dus dus su
T10D4201:168a-7: me'i char pa 'bab pa dang sa g-yo ba dang
T10D4201:168a-8: / 'ur sgra dang tug com dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:168a-9: de nas rgyal po des skya rengs shar ba'i tshe
T10D4201:168a-10: 'di ltar dge slong thams cad kha btags pa mthong
T10D4201:168a-11: nas / mya ngan gyis gdungs pa'i rgyus mig gis
T10D4201:168a-12: res 'ga' ni mthong res 'ga' ni mi mthong bar
T10D4201:168a-14: gtsug lag khang du brgyugs nas cho nges btab ste /
T10D4201:168a-15: dgra bcom pa dang dge slong sde snod gsum pa'i
T10D4201:168a-16: ming nas 'bod cing de gnyis kyi ro pang gis
T10D4201:168a-17: 'khyud de / 'di skad du kye sde snod gsum
T10D4201:168a-18: pa khyod ni bde bar gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos
T10D4201:168a-20: kye dgra bcom pa khyod ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi 'dzin pa lags na /
T10D4201:168a-21: da khyed gnyis nongs pas 'jig rten 'di stongs par gyur to zhes smra bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:168a-22: dam pa'i chos nub pa'i nub mo sum cu rtsa
T10D4201:168a-23: gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang lta ma yin gyis pham
T10D4201:168a-25: de nyid kyi nub mo lha rtag tu myos pa'i
T10D4201:168a-26: nang nas lha 'di ni zhes bya ba 'chi 'pho
T10D4201:168a-27: bar 'gyur ro // de nas 'dzam bu'i gling de'i bu ram shing dang /
T10D4201:168a-28: rgun dang sbrang rtsi thams cad kyang nub par 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:168a-29: bdud dbang sgyur zhes bya ba yang 'chi bar 'gyur te /
T10D4201:168a-30: de nas nas dang gro dang 'bras thams cad nub par 'gyur te /
T10D4201:168a-31: 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi zas su sred
T10D4201:168a-32: dang khre rgod dang rtsva'i 'bras bu sna tshogs za
T10D4201:168a-33: bar 'gyur ro // dar dang za 'og dang man tri dang /
T10D4201:168a-34: ras bzang po la sogs pa yang nub nas gos su gso ras dang /
T10D4201:168a-35: re phyar la sogs pa gyon par 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:168a-36: gser la sogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi
T10D4201:168a-37: rgyan rnams kyang nub nas rgyan du rtsva las byas
T10D4201:168a-38: pa la sogs pa thegs par 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:168b-0: tshon bzang po dang ro zhim po rnams kyang @168b nub par 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:168b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rnams kyang klu'i gnas su 'khyer bar 'gyur ro //
T10D4201:168b-2: li yul gyi mkhan po rnams 'dus nas li rje
T10D4201:168b-3: btsun legs kyi ring la yos bu'i lo la brtsis
T10D4201:168b-4: nas de nas lo brgya rtsa gnyis na dam pa'i
